workflow.meta: 信用风险排查报告审批流程

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var key;
key=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION WHERE ID =? CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID START WITH ID = 10016",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
key==0

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ecif.tIB_XMXX_GS WHERE TDFZR = ? AND ID = ? AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION WHERE ID =? CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID START WITH ID = 10016)",[$Login.User,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC,$Login.User.OrgID])>0

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a =ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_HISTORYSTEP WHERE ENTRY_ID = ? AND STEP_ID = 33 AND ACTION_ID = 34",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID]);
a>0;

step.name: 质控三部文管形式审核

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 53 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_GS_XYFXPCBGSP",O_WORKFLOW.ID,54,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}
